name: Open courtyards
description: Provides a cooling effect by creating convection currents.

name: Irrigation network
description: Support the production of additional crops that doesn't rely on rainfall.

name: Aqueducts
description: Open up the possibility of farming in more challenging terrain.

name: Water-lifting wheels
description: Improve the efficiency and reach of irrigation.

name: Field plans
description: Divide land systematically, plan the construction of canals, and estimate crop returns.

name: Storage
description: Cisterns, granaries, barns and silos to store water and harvested crops.

name: Threshing floors
description: Allow for efficient threshing of crops.

name: Crop rotation
description: Growing different kinds of crops in the same area in sequenced seasons reduces soil erosion. This increases fertility and safety of crops and results in a greater yield.

name: Windbreaks
description: Lines of trees or large bushes around cultivated areas protect smaller plants from wind erosion and excessive sunlight.

name: Soil convservation
description: Leach the soil to control salinity. Leave fields occasionally fallow. Sustainability leads to a greater long term yield.

name: Mathematics: Arithmetic
description: Efficient computation of squares, reciprocals, etc. using pre-calculated clay tablets.

name: Mathematics: Algebra
description: Find dimensions of e.g. rectangles by solving quadratic equations.

name: Mathematics: Geometry
description: Measure volumes, areas and relations of geometric shapes.
